    Impact of Blockchain Applications on Trust in Business

    Blockchain Business Ethics

    The “trustless” nature of blockchain draws researchers’ attention on investigating the implications of blockchain in business environments. From a view of business ethics, this paper aims at evaluating the impacts of blockchain applications on trust and business.
